website_summaries.verdict: Premium features for a middle-tier price. If you like the Android platform, give this phone some serious consideration.
pros: Has a big, beautiful screen,  good stereo speakers, and fast hardware at a great price
cons: Slow to receive Android OS updates

website_summaries.verdict: The Axon 7 is ZTE's best to date, but the OnePlus 3 is a better phone at the same price.
pros: The sophisticated and affordable ZTE Axon 7 has a zippy processor, expandable storage and loud speakers
cons: The phone is heavy and power users won't appreciate the non-removable battery

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, dual SIM is great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Used this for 3 months then ordered another for my wife. She loves it too. Great phone, dual SIM is great for traveling. Came with all accessories including a case and keyfob SIM tool so I can add local number/data when visiting another country. Fingerprint sensor works great and OS is getting regular updates so far. Battery life is excellent even with high drain apps/games. GPS is accurate and doesn't kill the battery too badly like older phones.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Chalmers

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest phone I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest phone I have ever owned. Until something breaks, then their repair division is completely incompetent. They have received and "repaired" my device twice under the passport program. I use quotations because they have sent my device back twice still broken. Their repair division must be full of idiots. It's like there is something wrong with the battery, and they replaced the screen. What in the ever living **** is wrong with these people?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, but not don't get too excited
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for 2 years now and loved it for about 20 months. Started out with amazing battery life, great photos, quick processing. I've dropped this phone 100 times, chucked it, practically ran it over and the screen barely has a scratch. Unbelievable! Now, however, the battery life is very poor and the phone randomly shuts off at 30%. If it's slightly cold the battery is drained almost instantly. It's become nearly unusable. So, great phone, for a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Another Smith person

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound great resolution..power button went flat in only 5 days doesn't work now so thank goodness for the mipop so I can at least restart. And lock the screen. I could power down with it also but then I couldn't power back up! Volume up button is also going flat although it still works if you really try and place your finger just right. Super signal ZTE advertises is not all that super either.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Johnson

customer_reviews.title: decent hardware, but deal breakingly bad software
customer_reviews.text: As much as I'd love to love a phone with expandable memory, a headphone jack, dual front blasting speakers, and an affordable price in 2017, MiFavor makes this phone an awful choice. UX is terrible, battery life is meh, the screen's awful touch detection makes simple typing a miserable chore, and it appears to have many issues with multitasking, with background streaming apps shutting down while in use every few minutes. Fingerprint scanner only works about half the time, many settings are hidden, and other settings have been replaced with nonfunctional proprietary solutions. Even for this low price, it is far from worth it. Don't fall for the decent hardware- the software makes this phone unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: This is the best phone on a budget
customer_reviews.text: I've had most known brand smartphones from Sony, Samsung, Nokia. This is the best phone on a budget. Screen and sound are amazing. Battery life is good. It looks gorgeous and feels high quality made. The only minus I found was that app icons like whatsapp, facebook or email don't show number of events you have to read, instead, there's a bell on savescreen that opens when you touch it and shows the hidden notifications. It's blazing fast. Doesn't get hot with heavy use. In 6 months it never froze or restarded!
customer_reviews.author: F. VILELA

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last long enough.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone, it's my 2nd ZTE. The battery doesn't last very long, though, especially if you're taking photos. The battery in my other ZTE phone was better, until it decided it was the end of life for the phone. It lasted me 4 years. ZTE really need to work on the battery lives of their phones.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone Under $400.00
customer_reviews.text: Amazing all-metal build, lightning-fast fingerprint reader, and my favorite part, dual stereo speakers, and my favorite part, the turbo-charging l, which got me from 20% to 100% in as little as 45 minutes. Along with that, the phone has a very long-lasting battery. The he only thing that is iffy is the camera, but it is far from the worst phone camera on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Brody J. McLelland

customer_reviews.title: March 2018: DOES NOT WORK with Boost Mobile/Sprint Network
customer_reviews.text: Although this phone is great in numerous ways that outnumber various other high-end phones on the market today (especially the dual speaker system), this phone is ONLY compatible with the Verizon Wireless and (supposedly) AT&T networks. I had to switch from Boost Mobile to Verizon because I didn't want to have to return this phone AND I didn't want to lose my phone number. Overall, words cannot describe the insane performance of this phone. On the other end of the spectrum, it's very disappointing that there's only two carriers that can support this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: beautiful screen, graphics -comes with EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: I have had NO issues with the Axon 7. IT KICKS BUTT. I know phones. Have mainly owned Nexuses or Motos as daily drivers. This is the first device that I have not felt the need to root and \ or modify. -Charges as fast as anything, 45 min on charger gives me a day at 40% brightness. -151000 + on antutu, scorches many 821 chips -DAYDREAM compatibility, beautiful screen, graphics -comes with EVERYTHING, headphones, case, screen protector -WARRANTY INCLUDED, 80$ to replace, no monthly fees. - NOT an Apple or Sammy Psst....I hear they will give me 100$ off on their next flagship for customer loyalty too....
customer_reviews.author: shane Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: This phone is the best reasonably priced phone on the market
customer_reviews.text: This phone is the best reasonably priced phone on the market. It stands up to high end models like samsung and LG in performance and features. I did a lot of research before buying this phone, and compared it to other high end models that came out in 2016. And hands down, this one always came out shining and in all areas and was hundreds of dollars less as well. The only 'Con' I can find for it is that there are not a large selection of cases and screen protectors available for this specific model. But, I am sure that the selection of accessories for this model will increase as it's sales increase.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap phone, that doesn't seem cheap. It definitely made me rethink ZTE
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, seems more fluid than most of the phones Ive used. Stock software was alright, but I'm glad I switched to AOSP. The phone that I got was actually faulty, so I called ZTE and found out they have an advanced exchange process. Where they send a brand new one, and I return my old one. All problems have been addressed with the new phone. Camera is beautiful, speakers are awesome, headphones are awesome too. All around awesome phone
customer_reviews.author: Capeorigins

customer_reviews.title: I've had to call in to ZTE customer support multiple times (really fun to do with a non-functioning phone)
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for less than 2 months, and all of a sudden the mic does not work during phone calls. From a cursory search online, it appears this is a common issue with the Axon 7. Rather than just honoring their warranty, I've had to call in to ZTE customer support multiple times (really fun to do with a non-functioning phone), and attempt several trouble shooting measures - none of which have not worked so far. Do not buy this phone - ZTE and Amazon customer service will not be helpful if you have issues with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bartz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. Very good phone and half of the cost ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this phone but after many comparisons of many other Chinese phones. I decided to get it. This is my secondary phone (got a free extra line from T-mobile). When I opened the box. I was impressed because it came with screen protector and casing. Also it updated to 7.1. This phone has many features that I impressed me. Also security patch is updated to March 2017. My primary phone is v20 still have security patch from December 2016. Highly recommended. Very good phone and half of the cost when compared to v20. Can't wait to see what axon8 looks like.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone at a reasonable price, all the features you expect from android plus great sound from the front facing speakers and a fast fingerprint unlock on the back is surprisingly intuitive and easy. I have dropped this phone and lost it in the snow for hours always boots right back up with no complaints. Quick charge in no time at all and hold that charge all day even when streaming netflix or youtube. The only complaint I have is the low light picture quality it really struggles to get a decent picture without good light.
customer_reviews.author: joel flores

customer_reviews.title: It is an awesome phone but definitely has some issues
customer_reviews.text: Pros: the pros are clear, it has the specs of all the other flagship phones available but for nearly half the cost. Cons: the first week I had it, it restarted randomly a few times. When I upgraded to nougat 7.0 my phone couldn't connect to the Verizon network fortunately Android has already fixed that with 7.1.1 If I am charging the battery I can only have a few apps open or it starts to overheat. It sometimes loses connection to my network and I have to restart it. Honestly these seem like a lot of issues and if heard of other people with more issues, but their not that bad and its still totally with the price.
customer_reviews.author: General_XIII

customer_reviews.title: Impressive phone at any price
customer_reviews.text: This is really an impressive phone. I've used the Samsung Galaxy line for a long time and like them - this is definitely a flagship killer. At half the price it has most of the functionality, a large beautiful display and is very fast. The ONLY downside to me is that it doesn't have any waterproofing. BTW, I'm also not a fan of non-replaceable batteries, however this one took a week to go from 100 - 0 using it about an hour a day for standard mixed usage (no games though)
customer_reviews.author: Stopokingme

customer_reviews.title: Great phone! My wife loves it now
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! My wife loves it now. She had a hard time adjusting from her old phone but now with this one they are inseparable! We are old so the sound from the dual speakers are great for ringtone and speaker phone.
customer_reviews.author: Scoot69

customer_reviews.title: No words....just wonderfull
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the phone for about 2 months now and all I can say is wow. $400 well spent. Even with our harsh exchange rate in South Africa. Not 1 single regret. The features are on par with the major players but for half the price. Poor sods with their iPhones and Samsungs. Best decision I've ever made on a phone. 1 negative has been trying to find a screen cover that would secure the whole screen. Other than that. Best phone ever - ( a year after its release)
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Has a ton of space, it's loud and has quality sound! I use mine for watching movies, playing games, listening to podcasts and reading comics. Also works with phone calls and texting really well. Friend bought the one+ at the same time, he's had nothing but problems, while the Axon 7 has none. I've dropped this phone several times and a few times on concrete. No cracks and it feels as solid as the day I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought two on refurb, very happy.
customer_reviews.text: We picked up two of these when they were on deep discount, refurbished, on Prime Day, and we love them - fast, slick, great screen. I'm traditionally an iOS user but I'm surprised how happy I am. Major weaknesses (besides systemic issues on Android): ZTE isn't always forthcoming about their updating plans (e.g., will this get Android O), and it doesn't support adopting the SD as internal storage. In late 2017, all in all, it feels like it would not feel dated for a couple of years, still.
customer_reviews.author: Mira Krishnan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, works perfectly on T-Mobile network. I got the Axon 7 after my Note 4 crashed and I must say I love it even more than I loved my Note. The front dual speakers and the Dolby option are awesome. The phone is very fast and the battery life is unbelievable (I've gone about 30 hours without charging) and the charge is super fast
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with phone, Have had it for a few months now and all is working well. Screen and sound is excellent, very classy looking, Battery life is good for how I use the phone, processor is not the latest but very fast. I great phone and really good when you consider the price. The phone also is not loaded with a bunch of crappy apps that you do not need. I am not sure how good the camera is, have just started using it and can't tell if it is up to par at this time. I would recommend purchase of this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Garyggo

customer_reviews.title: Nice moderately priced phone
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking, fair pricing, great vivid screen, and hate to cover its good looks with protection but it's a slippery little devil. So, better have a good screen protector. Non-illuminated function keys. After further use, the power on-off button is frequently accidentally hit clearing the screen and so is the on-screen menu key, when texting or typing. Not a good phone for in the dark use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great display, amazing sound from speakers and headphone
customer_reviews.text: Great display, amazing sound from speakers and headphone. No phone in 2017 can bring you as much as this phone from 2016 for the price. Solid build, rapid charge, battery life is great, and had Android 7 before most major brands. For the price and features no phone released in 2017 compares.
customer_reviews.author: ronniej1m

customer_reviews.title: Really happy!
customer_reviews.text: This smartphone is amazing. I was worried about all the concerns in software that I read in other reviews but it is ok for me. Until now I have not any trouble with software, just some apps do not work anymore in Nougat but there are similar apps that do the same job. I am really happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Neilsao

customer_reviews.title: Broken phone 2x in a row. Now I can't exchange.
customer_reviews.text: Well I've exchanged the phone once because it wouldn't recognize my sim. Now the phone sent to me has a defect that causes it to overheat to 56 C with basic usage. And even better, Amazon will now only offer a refund so I'm losing $40 in tax if I want to get a working phone. I expect a bit better quality control when I'm spending $400 after tax on a phone. This whole experience is very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: B. Milliken

customer_reviews.title: which he loved and could operate
customer_reviews.text: It was a neat phone, but did not interact well with the Verizon network as an unlocked phone. Text messaging was wonky, and the voicemail stopped working when we activated the phone. I downloaded a new texting app to smooth over the text issues, and that worked well. But we could not get the voicemail up and running even with tech help. Eventually I switched my non-tekkie husband back to a new old stock Note 4, which he loved and could operate.
customer_reviews.author: GPReplogle

customer_reviews.title: After upgrading to latest version this phone is absolutely amazing for the cost
customer_reviews.text: After upgrading to latest version this phone is absolutely amazing for the cost. It plays my games with no issues and has a wonderful battery life. Coming from a LG G4 to this phone I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: I-Review-Things

customer_reviews.title: Stops working correctly after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Preface: I take care of my electronics (cases and screen protectors, as well as proper handling and temp control) I know my way around electronics (it's what I do for a living). So, Bought this phone in May, worked very well, but a few months in (and just outside of warranty period) the screen no longer unlocks correctly, and phone does not respond to any screen or button commands for a good minute when attempting to first unlock it. Would've been a good phone if it didn't crap out just after 3 months of owning it. I guess I'll be going back to Samsung (lasted for years).
customer_reviews.author: Ez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful phone and very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful display, fast processor, plenty of memory, beautiful fit and finish. I had a little trouble getting 4G Lte signal at my house, but it has to do with the towers in my area and *nothing* to do with the phone (using Google Hangouts at my house VOIP solved that problem). The phone signal is very strong everywhere else, away from my house. Sound quality is fantastic. Would recommend this phone to anyone looking for a great Android phone at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good phone
customer_reviews.text: Less than 3 months after purchase and the screen is blinking on/black (the screen is on but blinking a black picture)... or half the screen is static. I have been trying to get ZTE to respond to my RMA request for over 2 weeks and they keep sending me email requests asking for info about the phone... and I send them the response.... and they send me a variation of the previous request back... And this morning, the phone started overheating just sitting there and resetting over and over for about 10-15 minutes. Seems like a good phone.... when it works. Also, this is NOT an isolated incident with the failures.... Google and you'll find its not an uncommon complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone. I love all the flagship features for ...
customer_reviews.text: This beast is phenomenal. I've been a diehard Samsung fan, and still like them, but I'm tired of the outrageous price tag on their flagships. ZTE has all the quality, bells and whistles the high priced phones have at less than half the price. I'm a heavy user on all aspects of the device and it always keeps up. The screen is great and it's lightning fast. I've had it for a year now and I am looking forward to the Oreo update and the Axon 9 coming soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this phone for several months and it keeps getting better as they push out the latest upgrades
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for several months and it keeps getting better as they push out the latest upgrades. I've had Samsung Note phones in the past but don't see any reason to pay the ridiculous prices they charge. No issues with the phone at all. Very fast. The packaging is very nice and the case looks very clean and expensive. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone, just as good and sometimes better than the iPhones or Samsungs that were the flagships when this was released. Still use to this day, June 2019. It's been dropped in oil and coolant. Fell from a 10 ft height onto concrete and still no cracked screen or issues with it. Would buy again to replace this one when the time comes for a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flagship quality for half the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this phone. It is flagshhip quality for half the price. I have had the phone for almost three months now. It has updated to Nougat which is running well. The built in speakers are amazing. I listen to Internet radio and Audible on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bube

customer_reviews.title: only lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: Loved the front facing speakers and unlimited data because ATT didnt know what phone they could limit me with, but the screen was irreparable after i dropped it in a case. gotta take the good with the bad... P.S. God bless you reader, Jesus loves you (Ephesians 2:8-9)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: This phone is great. The sound quality (dolby atmos) is probably the ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great. The sound quality (dolby atmos) is probably the best on the market especially from the front speakers. The OS is fine thus far, my only problem is that the camera app takes a little long to open (maybe 1s longer than it should) and there isn't a shortcut to open it from the phone being locked.
customer_reviews.author: narrin

customer_reviews.title: A Great Phone For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother for her birthday this year. Her phone was way out of date. This phone is leagues above her old one. It has great specs with a 2K display, 4GB RAM, SnapDragon 820 chip and duel front facing stereo speakers along with a 20MP camera just to name a few. I think this phone was an excellent phone at $400 at the time I bought it. If the price was to come down to $300, this phone would be an ever better buy. For $100 more, $500 you can get the newly released OnePlus 5T which has faster internals.
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe

customer_reviews.title: Unable to get cell phone signal within Government work places
customer_reviews.text: Unable to get cell phone signal within Government work places, especially military bases. As a matter of fact, I get no cell phone coverage within government institutions. My co-workers have no problems with their cell phones purchased from other makers. I would strongly advise for people to do their research on all ZTE phones before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: however the sound by itself is great so it is not that of an issue to ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built phone, pleasant to the eye, the ear and the hand, smooth performance at all times, all of it at an unbeatable price (it even is one of the very few daydream-ready smartphones). The only downside, which I think is a software issue, is that dolby atmos seems not to work properly, however the sound by itself is great so it is not that of an issue to me. I will update if my view changes (have had it for a couple weeks).
customer_reviews.author: Javo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this phone.it sounds amazing and looks great. The screen the sharp and colorful and the shipping was very quick. Only down side is that the nougat update blocks unlocking bootloader. Anyone looking for a fantastic fantastic look no further
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I saved hundreds of dollars on a fantastic phone!
customer_reviews.text: I received the phone and I was absolutely flawless, just as described, this is really an excellent company to buy a phone from... they even included one of the highest quality perfectly fitting case protectors for the phone...stellar service!
customer_reviews.author: timberghost

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't really done much research on this phone before I bought it, but had read all great things about it. I've had it for about a month and I love it! In my opinion, the best Android on the market currently. It's a great phone. It comes packaged with a speed charger wall plug and cord, extra adapter piece for the charger, and even a clear silicone phone case! 10/10 for me.
customer_reviews.author: mamalido

customer_reviews.title: My experience
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone since March 2017. It has been a pretty good phone except a few small issues & static. And I picked this phone based on the features it offered that others didn't. But this last week it started experiencing the half screen of non usable fuzz. Randomly. My son bought the exact same phone at the same time and his had started the screen issue a few months before mine. ZTE warranties the phones for two years. They will either try to fix the phone or swap it with a like new device. Fyi
customer_reviews.author: jennifer l. bishop

customer_reviews.title: Killer budget phone. Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Wish screen was a little brighter. Camera isn't as good as S7 but a decent camera. App from the store makes the camera 100. Times better.
customer_reviews.author: CajunTower

customer_reviews.title: Does Everything I Want a Smartphone to Do
customer_reviews.text: A top line phone for hundreds less than the big names! Very good specs, outstanding reviews. I particularly like the display and that ZTE sticks pretty close to basic Android. ZTE sent an update for Nougat the same day I read about it. My only small complaint is the proprietary charging system. It'll work on any USB port, but more slowly than the port may be capable of.
customer_reviews.author: Californian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fast shipping from Amazon, the phone itself is all anyone needs for a smartphone. Large screen and beautiful display. Only complaint is the camera photo quality could use some improvement.
customer_reviews.author: The Kanester

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever!  ...for under 700$
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly solid phone for the price. For people complaining of spyware the suspicious app WeShare is a Chinese data transfer program that can be disabled and all priveleges denied to it rather easily.
customer_reviews.author: James Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, supported by the best customer service and warranty policy
customer_reviews.text: After 8 months I can say that this was the best phone buying decision I have made since I bought my first smart phone. Half the price of other companies flag ships and no noticeable differences, this phone might even be better. Runs a very vanilla android experience without a bunch of crappy bloatwear. Has one of the best screens on the market, great battery life. And best of all is the warranty/customer service who are very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Constantine

customer_reviews.title: What a bargan.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second exact phone because my original one was starting to have battery issues. Replacing the battery would have cost half as much as buying this new one. I use the old one now like an iPad. The new one is a great value as was the original one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect unlocked phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone hasn't failed to impress, and I am picky. The speakers are bliss, the screen is top notch and the 820 runs pristine, I think I've only ever had one glitch in the past month. Battery gets me through a day with thorough use and about 20-25% left at eod. I've dropped it a couple times and no issues whatsoever. If you're looking for an unlocked phone and prefer to buy outright like me, this is the golden ticket. I feel the 350 I spent is and will be well worth it in the long run. Great device.
customer_reviews.author: mikey

customer_reviews.title: It's been swell with this phone
customer_reviews.text: Never had a major problem with this phone. Battery lasted me for about 2 years until it just kept running out and seeming totally nonfunctional. Apps would occasionally crash but it wasn't a big deal to me. Camera is also pretty good unless you're in a low light setting.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Potens

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great Phone, Screen size is just right. Phone is light compared to larger phones. What I like the most is the audio. Front facing speakers on left and right. The audio is loud and great. Would like to have little better battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mike The Geek!

customer_reviews.title: phone lasted 6 months...
customer_reviews.text: The phone had software issues right from the start. After a month, updates finally fixed the issues. The battery doesn't last long, at 50% by the evening, and that's with normal use. If I listen to music at the gym, I'll be at 36% in less than 4 hours. After 6 months the phone has a half-side display standstill (right half scrolls and can be operated while the left side of screen is white noise). Not happy with the phone and after looking at zte forums I can see this phone has more issues than just mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this phone so far
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone so far. I've had it for around a week and already love it more than my old Galaxy S6. For the price, you won't find anything better. The speakers, camera and speed of the phone are unmatched. I highly recommend this phone for anyone. It has a dual sim capability and an expandable sd card slot. If you are on the fence, don't be. Get this phone ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanial M. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Working fast on a internet and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Working fast on a internet and the memory is huge! I had a Samsung Galaxy before not a big difference
customer_reviews.author: verica

customer_reviews.title: ... in February 2017 expecting it to last me a good couple of years
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this in February 2017 expecting it to last me a good couple of years. The phone looks good and performance has been great as well! However I ran into a charging problem this July. I can not charge the device when it is turned on, but when I turn it off it charges like normal. I tried rebooting the device multiple times but it didn't work. Wiping off the cache from recovery mode didn't work either. It's starting to become very frustrating. PLEASE HELP ! Would change review if problem resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you need a phone in 2017, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. love the fingerprint scanner. Good price. I appreciate them giving free cover & screen protector. I wish they allowed to change batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kashif

customer_reviews.title: This phone is excellent. It has a few minor quirks
customer_reviews.text: This phone is excellent. It has a few minor quirks, but no more so than a Samsung or iphone. This thing is very powerful, and it chugs along quite well. Very good value. Highly recommend. My major gripe is that the home, back and app buttons do not light up, even though they are integral with the screen, and they are tough to see under low lighting. If it weren't for that, I would give this phone 5 🌟.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Great phone better price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for a few months now and I couldn't be happier. Works just as well as flagship phones at half the cost. If I had one con it would be the fingerprint sensor. I work with my hands and if my fingers are dry or wet or dirty it just won't work.
customer_reviews.author: B Tack

customer_reviews.title: Its a very good product. I used Samsung Galaxy Edge 7 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a very good product. I used Samsung Galaxy Edge 7 and other high end mobiles. But I found this mobile better or comparatively same as high end mobiles with less price. Display, performance Camera touch finger scanner everything is best. Please go for it. you will love it..... Certified by a 10 yrs expert Test Engineer ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amjad

customer_reviews.title: Very  nice phone!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfull phone! This phonen is something! Seller put a no expected gift in the box that make happy, a 10050 mhp power bank, high quality, for free! Very happy with this purchase. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The camera on this phone is deplorable inside. You ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera on this phone is deplorable inside. You will see reviews where people claim it preforms less than average in low light, but it's almost as if you MUST use the flash. Outdoor pictures are phenomenal however. I wish I could give it a 3.7... Customer service did not know why I couldn't receive text messages from certain people, but I inevitably figured it out by turning the VoLTE off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. Works well on T-Mobile with a few cravats. Can't send group messages and almost never sends or receives picture texts. I am going to contact TMobile to see if they can help me find a fix. Hopefully so because other wise, it is a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin

customer_reviews.title: My new Axon
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed; especially for the price. Just be careful if you want to use it on Verizon. It takes awhile to get the network connection to work.
customer_reviews.author: FLGriller

customer_reviews.title: best  phone  but  not  water  proof at all
customer_reviews.text: this phone is amazing sterio speaker cheapest daydream vr ready phone and the duel front speakers make t so much better this is my second one first one got a little wet in the rain and messed the Sim tray up but its OK I got a new one
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Power button issue
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone but i keep having a power button issue. It just wont turn back on no matter what i do i habe to reset it and its supper anyyoing
customer_reviews.author: kc/eat/eva

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone cannot be more the pleased
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone cannot be more the pleased , the audio and speakers are amazing . Will never buy a Galaxy S or I Phone again .
customer_reviews.author: Panagiotis Skartsilas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good phone for the price, but after just under a year it started to fail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible signal reception!
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great Phone if the signal quality wasn't so poor, which is a shame because the Axon 7 does everything else so well. I have given up on this phone and have gone back to using my old Moto 3G, due to terrible signal quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beetle1302

customer_reviews.title: Superb phone.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely superb phone ZTE has done an excellent job just a few small things I didn't like not even worth mentioning, but what a great phone. Maybe the black borders I didn't like I am sure if the axon 8 is the same without the black borders and all screen will be just as brilliant and needs a bigger battery and little optimisation for it to work smoothly. Otherwise excellent love it .
customer_reviews.author: zip

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone but glitch after 5 months of normal use ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Phone but glitch after 5 months of normal use ( screen split down the middle" vertically" with1/2 white & Black fuzz). Went on ZTE forums and in finding out it's a hardware issue. I'm sending it in and will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Frank here...

customer_reviews.title: Monster Sound and Clear, Sharp Display
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for 6 months now, and I've very satisfied. Obviously the sound is one of the strongest features for this phone. The sound is very loud and clear. I bought this phone because I was tired of cupping my hand to listen to a video I was watching, but I have absolutely no problem now; I often find myself turning it down because it's so loud. The camera is good, but when compared to a phone such as the Galaxy S7 there is subtle differences with the S7 coming out on top. The display is very clear and sharp. The feel of the phone is very solid. Excellent phone for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if all these reviews are legit.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if all these reviews are legit...but I bought this phone and only 2 days in, the phone starting re-starting on its own, and then after 5 days, the phone screen permanently froze and became unusable. Returned it shortly after.
customer_reviews.author: Hasan

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great phone for the price. Good size screen. Colors on camera and videos are awesome. Baterrey last more than a 24hrs. giving it a normal use all day. Sound on speakers are great as well, its truly a dolby. Con: the bottons on the bottom for: menu, back and the other apps have no light, so at night you'll have to memorize where are them or just press until something comes up. No sound when recording on slowmotion.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Much better screen (could be better color corrected
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from Nexus 5x (LG), what a difference! Much better screen (could be better color corrected, tends to be a bit on green site) but for the price no complaints. Very fast. Only minor issues are the capacitive button don't always respond to the touch and GPS reception could be better. Sound is outstanding. No problem with phone calls. Very fast. For the money don't know how you can beat it.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Axon 7
customer_reviews.text: After doing extensive research on a unlocked android I found the ZTE Axon 7 to be the best overall value that I was looking for. Once I received it the Axon 7 performed amazingly. I went from Alcatel Window 10 back to Android, very happy to have made the switch.
customer_reviews.author: paulie pontrelli

customer_reviews.title: good memory and apps handling
customer_reviews.text: Over all a commendable product, has decent specs, crisp display, good memory and apps handling. Major issue is with the capacitive buttons - not very responsive and does not illuminate in the dark. There is no on-screen navigation button either, hence switching between applications could be annoying. Hope ZTE seriously considered having the on-screen navigation button on this model, just as they have it on Axon 7 mini.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: Doing good
customer_reviews.text: Dad has used it for a few months now and it's doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: On par with the flagships for a better price
customer_reviews.text: After sorting out the service issues with my provider (things like giving them the IMEI number and the SIM card number), I was able to get 4G LTE service. On top of that, I find this phone to be on par with most flagship phones out there. The only thing lacking for me is water resistance and a physical home button. Aside from that, this phone is spectacular. With the price at half of the competition, I would and have recommended this product to people I know.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Smith

customer_reviews.title: 500% better than an Apple product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone. I've had it for almost 2 years and I have no intention on upgrading to a different model anytime soon. Quick charge feature is phenomenal (be sure to use the proper type of fast-charging cable & no generic 7/11 cables!)
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Couch Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!!
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed with the available emoticons (too small) but I guess I can download some? Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ckingpc2

customer_reviews.title: So far a great phone fingerprint scanner is fast
customer_reviews.text: So far a great phone fingerprint scanner is fast ,lots of space and has expandable memory via micro sd. Many reviewers complained about the camera although it is not as great as the current phones it i still a very good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar V. Ruelas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone one of the best
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, my first ever phone actually, still works great and I am using till today one of the best phones out there
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel J.

customer_reviews.title: An $800 phone for a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.text: A mid-tier priced phone with the performance and features of a $800 phone. From an amazing screen, dual front facing speakers, great camera, and overall solid build; you can't go wrong with the Axon 7.
customer_reviews.author: Svaaz

customer_reviews.title: The phone and phone features are good, but the battery life is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The phone and phone features are good, but the battery life is horrible. My phone just turned a year old and has zero battery life. I can't even turn it on. Replacing the battery is not easy and very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jhonathan

customer_reviews.title: A great phone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: A great phone at a great price. I wish the main buttons are back-lit for night navigation and notifications are displayed without having to click on the notification icon.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Huynh

customer_reviews.title: great phone for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This smartphone at the moment is working perfectly I must say, the camera, the ram, the processor, the battery, the screen, works marvelous. The design itself is astonishing. Although I don't use social media to put the phone works in other layers i cannot comment more about the phone, great prince for and good phone
customer_reviews.author: Alan N.

customer_reviews.title: this phone is 10 times better then any 1000$ phone you can buy on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy how cheap in price and powerful this phone is you know big cell phone companies have been ripping us off for years..this phone is 10 times better then any 1000$ phone you can buy on the market now or even next year..Samsung,LG,and Apple should be hanged for ripping off people
customer_reviews.author: David Wallette

customer_reviews.title: I'm really frustrated because I love the phone but this is the second one that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July and now the battery will not charge up fully. Keeps telling me to use proper charger but I have it on the charger that came with the phone. I'm really frustrated because I love the phone but this is the second one that has started to fail me... Please help or I'm gonna have to buy another one...
customer_reviews.author: Edwin L.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product, highly recommend, fast shipping too
customer_reviews.author: Kim E. Yri

customer_reviews.title: Good phone wirh perfect camera
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Very good camera. Very nice that there is a case our of the box. Quick charger usb3.0 works perfect and there is a adapter with allows to use any charger when required. Phone a bit heats up during charging. May be large for women hand but large screen is convenient for eyes. Finger prints works perfect and it's very nice feature If take in account that I didn't plan to use it at first :)
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: This is a great phone! Works with Verizon prepaid if you active ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone! Works with Verizon prepaid if you active sim first on a Verizon phone. Also works with T-Moble, wifi calling is hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: Monica S. Reigle

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone.
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. A2017U model's radio is sub-standard w/ T-Mobile, but if you have the know how ZTE provides a bootloader unlock which allows you to flash a better radio.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is that a few drops and the vibration motor seems to be acting up. Sometimes it vibrates but sounds like something is shorting out but it works. For awhile there was something on the camera but now with the updates and 1 more drop seems to have fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: SO BEAUTIFUL! Can't wait for their next model to be released. Speakers are super clean & crisp sounding. Best device by far in the $400 price range.
customer_reviews.author: MACreation

customer_reviews.title: Great way to replace a Nexus phone.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one I have purchased. This one replaced my wife's Nexus 5X, The others replaced my Nexus 5, and my son's Nexus 4. Great phones for under $400. Sound, screen, speed, memory size, is awsome.
customer_reviews.author: A-Tech

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone.  Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. It has everything you want- screen, design, dual speakers, fingerprint reader, tons of ram, expandable storage. Wiped it and installed Lineage OS and it runs like butter without any bloat. Best phone for not too much money.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever, runs Android 7.0 nougat and rivals phones twice the cost.
customer_reviews.author: NizzleB

product_meta.title: ZTE Axon 7 Unlocked Smartphone,64GB Ion Gold (US Warranty)
product_meta.description: Color:Ion GoldThe ZTE Axon 7 is the one 'unlocked' smartphone that delivers the best acoustic experience unlike any other device in its category with its ground breaking High-fidelity audio experience along with its attention to design detail and performance of a high end smartphone that these discerning consumers have come to appreciate and expect.
feature_bullets: Great sounding and listening smartphone with hifi audio - High quality sound reproduction and amplification of music/video playback and record.
Optimized Camera experience takes great still images and video with minimal manual operation - larger Camera, 20 MP rear and 8 MP front facing cameras, for higher quality images
Fingerprint customization - launching apps, taking pictures, for security and to launch other application
Beautiful Industrial design with continuous smooth surface that feels great in your hands
3250 mAh battery with Qualcomm quick charge 3.0, Expandable memory Android M (6.0.1), Qualcomm Snapdragon 820 Processor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,069 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: ZTE Axon 7, Headphones, Charger, USB Cable, USB Adapter, Tray Eject Tool, Protective Case, Warranty Card, Quick Start Guide
